name: Cherry Balsamic Iced Tea
keywords: cherries, dried cherries, tea, dairy-free, gluten-free, low-fat, low-sodium, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text: Place the dried cherries in a food processor and process until finely chopped. Transfer to a bowl and add the boiling water, tea bags and ginger. After 4 minutes, remove the tea bags. Let stand until cool. Strain through a fine sieve. Stir in vinegar and refrigerate until cold. Serve over ice, garnished with cherries.
